name: Swing Education, Inc
description: Developer of a substitute teaching platform designed to connect substitute teachers and schools. The company's platform handles the screening, paperwork, and assignments, enabling teachers to obtain desirable assignments for schools and place quality substitutes throughout the school year.
one_liner: Developer of a substitute teaching platform designed to connect substitute teachers and schools.
